label: A2BC4D_tI16_121_d_a_i_b-001
title: Stannite (Cu$_{2}$FeS$_{4}$Sn, $H2_{6}$) Structure
comments: If $c=2a$, $x=1/4$, and $z=3/8$, the atoms are on the sites of the \href{current_web_home_dir/A_cF8_227_a-001}{diamond ($A4$) structure}. If, in addition, the Cu, Fe, and Sn atoms are replaced by a single atom type the crystal reduces to the \href{current_web_home_dir/AB_cF8_216_a_c-001}{zincblende ($B3$) structure}.
